Name: Cosmic Tank
About the game: Cosmic Tank is a modern take on the classic game Asteroids . Mine your way to riches! Fight off hostile threats! Upgrade your ship and rent a few helpful drones! Survive epic boss fights! When you've beaten the game, play again with a different weapon setup! Dozens of hours of gameplay in an affordable package!
